answers.answer: Try eating less sugar and carbs also switch to wheat bread bake and boil more meat than frying that's what I did when they told me that also drink smoothies and water or shake em ups
Oh so I guess her weight is not that bad newjulymommy? Maybe doctor is exaggerating. And thanks niqueniq

At 32w5d my baby weighed 4lbs 7oz an they said that weight was normal.. I also gain close to 10lbs a month :/ an I don't eat unhealthy, I only eat 3 times a day an I don't eat out. All I eat is home cooked meals. Idk why I weigh so much so fast. My doc isn't concerned tho, they said as long as baby is healthy then they really don't care how much I gain.. I'm 36wks an I've gained 36lbs so far.

my doctor is concerned she wants for me to be healthy too not just my baby, she stresses me out :( and yeah i know me too i dont eat junk food its crazy that im gaining so much. goodluck with your pregnancy sutton19 thanks for sharing
Can any more ladies comment and share what your baby's weight was at 29-30 wks pls?
Idk about 30 weeks but at 34 weeks my baby weighed 4 1/2 pounds..
At 31 weeks my daughter was 4lbs and 8oz....I'm currently 39 weeks today and she weighed 7lbs 3oz...my doc said she's in the 51% tile
at 30 weeks my baby weighed 2.5 pounds
At 32 weeks my baby was 3lbs 7oz .. I'm tiny tho so were not expecting a baby over 6lbs

question: How much was your baby weighing at 29-30 wks?? I went to the doctor and found out my baby girl is already weighing 3 pounds doc said she was bigger than the usual baby weight for 29-30 wks :( I've been gaining weight like crazy every month I gain at least 10 pounds doctor is furious with me :(( idk what to do anymore I mean I don't pig out idk what's happening I just eat what's normal I'm not actually eating for 2..I'm really concerned and worried cuz doctor said that if I keep gaining weight like this I'll end up with diabetes by 34 wks and with an unplanned c-section cuz baby will be too big. I'm soostressed i don't even want to eat more more cuz it seems every singe thing I eat makes me gain 2 pounds :,/
title: weight?
